mapper.select: SELECT fa.`id`, fa.`audio_name`, fa.audio_artist, fa.audio_create, fa.audio_update, sre.res_path AS audioPath , (SELECT sr.`res_path` FROM `sys_resource` sr WHERE sr.`id` = fa.audio_cover_id) AS coverPath, (SELECT sr.`res_path` FROM `sys_resource` sr WHERE sr.`id` = fa.audio_lrc_id) AS lrcPath FROM `file_audio` fa LEFT JOIN `sys_resource` sre ON sre.`id`=fa.`resource_id`
